text: Fast Company is a 1929 American sports comedy movie directed by A. Edward Sutherland and was based on the play Elmer the Great by George M. Cohan and Ring Lardner. It stars Evelyn Brent, Jack Oakie, Richard "Skeets" Gallagher, Sam Hardy, Gwen Lee, Arthur Housman and was distributed by Paramount Pictures. ==Other websites== * Category:1929 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by A. Edward Sutherland Category:Paramount Pictures movies
title: Fast Company (1929 movie)
